pages.text: $(li)Slabfish are aquatic and land creatures that can be found rarely in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/marsh)Marsh$(/l).$(br)$(li)These creatures can be tamed giving them $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/tropical_fish)Tropical Fish$(/l).$(br)$(li)Once tamed, you can shift right click on them to make them to sit or stand up.
If a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/jukebox)Jukebox$(/l) is playing near them. They will start to dance!

$(li)If you right click in your tamed Slabfish, a new GUI will appear.$(br)$(li)Here you can insert a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/chest)Chest$(/l) that it will be used such as a backpack.$(br)$(li)You can insert a dye to tint its backpack.$(br)$(li)This creature will pick up everything that it is near of it and it will save it in its backpack.
$(li)You can breed these creatures give them a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/pufferfish)Pufferfish$(/l).
